title: $16 -- Raptors 905: Choice of 5 Games in Mississauga
text:
Thank you for updating your zip code Raptors 905 
Raptors 905, the Toronto Raptors new NBA D-League team, is about to begin their first season in Mississauga, and Travelzoo members can save 45% on tickets to the following home games: vs. Maine Red Claws on Wednesday, Nov. 19 at 7:30 p.m. vs .Idaho Stampede on Saturday, Nov. 25 at 7:30 p.m. vs. Delaware 87ers on Monday, Nov. 29 at 2 p.m. vs. Grand Rapids Drive on Friday, Dec. 5 at 2 p.m. vs. Erie Bay Hawks on Wednesday, Dec. 9 at 7:30 p.m. 
The following seating sections at the Hershey Centre are available: Corners … $16 (reg. $30 incl. taxes & fees) Sides … $21 (reg. $36 incl. taxes & fees) Premium Sides … $23 (reg. $39 incl. taxes & fees) 
Each ticket purchase will also include a complimentary ticket to the preseason game on Nov. 8 against the Erie Bay Hawks. See future all-stars take the court with former assistant coach of the Houston Rockets and Toronto Raptors, Jesse Mermuys, at the helm.
